All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable
public class DicomInputStream
extends BinaryInputStream

Extends BinaryInputStream to add dicom specific read primitives

Author:
Laurent Lecomte

DicomInputStream

public DicomInputStream(InputStream stream)
Construct a stream to read DICOM data sets.

ImplicitVRLittleEndian (dicom default) will be set)

stream - the input stream to read from
